text: Wahi hai jisne aasmano aur zameen ko chey (six) dino mein paida kiya aur phir arsh par jalwa farma hua. Uske ilm mein hai jo kuch zameen mein jata hai aur jo kuch ussey nikalta hai, aur jo kuch aasman se utarta hai aur jo kuch usmein chadhta hai. Woh tumhare saath hai jahan bhi tum ho. Jo kaam bhi karte ho usey woh dekh raha hai
